oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old Hickory News
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Sixteen press-printed pages of a newspaper circulated for families of the DuPont Old Hickory Gunpowder Plant. The Old Hickory News contains stories on the munitions plant and quaint Village happenings. The front-page headline: "Suspension Bridge Over the Cumberland at Old Hickory--A Fine Piece of Work." At the time, this was the largest swinging bridge in the world. It connected the plant to the railroad at Edenwold. The spread on pages 8-9 is a view of the crowd on employee payday.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World war, 1914-1918; World war, 1914-1918 - History
